text: Balli Durga Prasad Rao (15 June 1956 â€“ 16 September 2020) was an Indian politician. He was elected to the Lok Sabha, lower house of the Parliament of India in the 2019 Indian general election. He was a member of the YSR Congress Party. Rao was also a member of the Andhra Pradesh MLA from 1985 to 1989, 1994 to 1999, and 2009 to 2014. Rao died at a medical center in New Delhi on 16 September 2020 from COVID-19, aged 64. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in New Delhi Category:Politicians from Andhra Pradesh Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Balli Durga Prasad Rao
